name: ElizaChatbot
0:
”Alexa, open Eliza Chatbot”
”What is your name?”
”I am happy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eliza chatbot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Eliza engages you in conversation, asks you questions, and responds to what you say! This is a great skill to use to entertain your friends or guests - you can sneak out for a moment and leave them talking to Eliza! 

No user information is recorded in the process so just talk to her about anything you want - let it all out. This tool does not provide real advice and is for informational and educational purposes only.

This is a voice enabled implementation loosely based on the ELIZA chatbot concept created at the MIT Artificial Intelligence Laboratory in 1960s.

Tip: Eliza is pronounced "Ih-lye-zuh"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
